attributes.action: allow a couple to have IVF, ICSI, IUI, Clomid etc on the NHS even if one of the couple already has a child.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For all the people out there in the same position as myself who are being denied the fertility treatment they need as one of the couple has a child already. Its an unfair rule, lets get it changed!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
